title: (x) Looking for packaging icons - FF Cartonnage, FF Care Pack {Chris Keegan, Stephen}
content:
Hi there, this isnt really a type ID post but was not sure where to put it.

Can anyone help me? I am looking for an icon which describes "heavy package".

Like the kind you find on the size of boxes when the contents are heavy.

Are there any typefaces out there that contain some of these icons

Thanks

Matt
author: Matt Squire
